title: Client Onboarding
initialStepDescription1: The information we request from you will help us complete setting up your account.
initialStepDescription2: Please review and update any information that needs confirmation; and provide any additional information requested.
initialStepNoOrganizationType: Please select your organization type to preview the information you will need to confirm or provide.

initialStepOrganizationTypeInformationFu: As a $t(organizationTypes.{{organizationType}}) using {{product}} in {{jurisdiction}}, you will need to confirm or provide the following information:
beneficialOwnerDialogDescriptionEdit: Make changes to beneficial owner information here. Click save when you're done.
beneficialOwnerDialogDescriptionAdd: Fill out the information for the new beneficial owner here. Click save when you're done.

errorMessages.default: An error occurred while fetching client data. Please try again.
errorMessages.clientNotFound: Client not found. Please try again or contact support.

initialStepNotes.title: Important Notes
initialStepNotes.additionalQuestions: Additional questions may be required based on your provided information
initialStepNotes.llcOwners: As an LLC, you will be able to add additional beneficial owners
initialStepNotes.attestation: You will need to review and attest to the accuracy of all provided information
initialStepNotes.kycProcess: Identity verification (KYC) process will be required for all controlling parties
initialStepNotes.termsAndConditions: You will need to review and accept the Terms & Conditions

messages.solePropEinOptional: As a sole proprietor, an EIN is optional unless you have employees or file certain tax returns.

copyBusinessAddressLabel: Controller's personal address is the same as the business address
